### Segona B

```{r echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(kableExtra)
library(dplyr)
d <- read.csv("~/Google Drive/Futbol/finalsestiu20.csv")
t <- read.csv("~/Google Drive/Futbol/teamlist.csv")
names(d)[1] <- "team"
d <- d %>% left_join(t, by = "team") %>% select(-team)
names(d)[3] <- "team"
d <- d %>% left_join(t, by = "team") %>% select(shortname.x,p1,p2,shortname.y,league)
d$p1 <- d$p1*100
d$p2 <- d$p2*100
d1 <- d %>% filter(league == "segonab") %>% select(-league)
names(d1) <- c("Equip", "Guanyar", "Guanyar", "Equip")
kable(d1, digits = 1, align = "lccr")  %>%
  column_spec(1, bold = T) %>% column_spec(2, border_right = T) %>% column_spec(4, bold = T)
```
